Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma has no plans of giving up on T20Is yet.
Hemant Brar: 'New Zealand bowling will be tested'
Gill and Kishan are set to open for India, as Shaw bides his time and Gaikwad is ruled out of the series with a wrist injury
In the fast-bowling department, Umran Malik and Shivam Mavi will have another opportunity to build on their performances against Sri Lanka
Wasim Jaffer: 'New Zealand bowling will be tested'
Mitchell Santner will take over the captaincy from Tom Latham, who had led in the ODIs
Under Santner, New Zealand have eight wins, one loss and one no-result in ten T20Is. But seven of those wins have come against Ireland, Scotland and Netherlands
Finn Allen scored ducks in the last two ODIs on this tour
